turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four small pizzas. And I would like one of them to be barbecue chicken, one Meat Lovers, one plain cheese, and then one just veggies.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And all of them need thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, for the veggie one did you want the veggie lovers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 small pizzas, one bbq chicken, 1 meatlovers, 1 veggie lovers, and 1 plain cheese, all with thin crust, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
